notes: Summary: The settlement data was derived from both the UNDP 1998 and UNDP 2005 datasets along with that of GTZ 2002, FSNAU, KEMRI and OCHA.. This data was cleaned by FAO-SWALIM and OCHA and is updated on a regular basis. Abstract: Point data of over 10,000 settlements within Somalia, not including IDP settlements. This dataset was compiled by various sources, GTZ, FSNAU, OCHA, Kemri and UNDP and is maintained and updated by OCHA Somalia
